title: Delhi HC seeks reply from RBI, SEBI on unlawful lending practices carried by Paisalo Digital
description: The Delhi High Court has sought responses from the RBI and SEBI regarding unethical lending practices by Paisalo Digital. Mukesh Arya's plea alleges violation of RBI's Master Circulars and seeks an independent inquiry and audits. Santanu Agarwal clarifies the company's stance on the matter.
